attributes.action: Insist the Football Association appoint "The People's Manager", Harry Redknapp!
attributes.additional_details:
England have won ONE tournament in 1966. Now I am not knocking this achievement, but it was before I was blooming born! 

I am now going grey and I am fed up! The FA are affecting my health.

I hope this is sufficient information for those in power!

Ta very much!
attributes.background:
1970's we were rubbish and had the opportunity to appoint a brilliant manager in the name of Brian Clough, yet the FA gave the job to Ron Greenwood!
1990's the FA appointed Graham Taylor, turned out to be Mr Turnip Head.
Roy Hodgson appointed instead of Harry Redknapp and look where he got us!
